#summary Describes the app PenemuNXT Explorer Server

= Introduction =

The serverapp [http://code.google.com/p/penemunxt/source/browse/#svn/trunk/PenemuNXTExplorerClient PenemuNXTExplorerClient] that communicates with the [ExplorerRobot], retrieves data and visualizes a map.
